import pic from '../images/logoSignUpPage.jpg' import Data from '../data/loginCredentials.json' import { useState } from 'react' export default function SignUpPage(){ var [emailId,setEmailId]=useState("") var [password,setPassword]=useState("") var emailFunction=(e)=>{ setEmailId(e.target.value) } var passwordFunction=(e)=>{ setPassword(e.target.value) } function update(){ var x={ "email":emailId, "password":password } Data.pop() } function pop(){ Data.pop() } return( <>
); }
